ing: 3 ounces shredded mozzarella-style vegan cheese (such as DaiyaÂ®)
1/4 cup vegan cream cheese substitute (such as Tofutti Â®)
1/4 cup vegan margarine (such as Earth BalanceÂ®)
2 tablespoons vegan sour cream (such as TofuttiÂ®)
1 dash garlic powder, or to taste
1 dash ground nutmeg, or to taste
des: "Vegan Alfredo sauce you can just pour over your favorite pasta."
ins: Blend mozzarella-style vegan cheese, soy milk, cream cheese substitute, vegan margarine, vegan sour cream, nutritional yeast, garlic powder, and ground nutmeg in a blender until smooth.
